events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn’t updated in days. Can you help?
The reported issue is regarding a shipment delay as the customer’s order has not arrived within the expected timeframe.
A customer service agent has been assigned to address the delay in delivery for this order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m sorry to hear your delivery is delayed. I’ll look into it right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number you have so I can check the shipping status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking code is ZX987654321. The tracking status hasn’t changed for four days.
I have contacted our courier partner and found your package was delayed due to a sorting issue. They’ve expedited the shipment and it should arrive within 3 days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you resolving this quickly. I’ll wait for the package to arrive soon.
We have resolved the delivery delay issue and ensured your package is on its way with expedited shipping at no additional cost.
Just checking in to confirm your delivery has arrived safely. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the package arrived today and everything is in perfect condition. Thanks again for your help!
The case is now closed as the delivery issue has been resolved and the customer confirmed receipt of the order.
